All Classes

Class Description
Bloc
This class manage the information of the elements use in a board, this is also a way to dissociate a bloc from a text.
Board
Class to manage the entire level, it stock all the element use in the enigma and manage the element each other.
Coordinate
Coordinate in 2 dimension with an int x and an int y to specify the coordinate of an element.
Direction
Enumeration of the possible direction in the game.
Display  
Element
An element in the game is a texture that can be manipulate (push, destroy, interact) in the game.
MapGenerator
Class use to generate the map according to a file.txt.
Material
A material is neither a Noun, an operator or a property.
Noun
An Noun implements the interface "Material" and list all the Noun that the user can interact with.
Operator
An operator is a Material, it does the link between the noun and the property.
PathAssets
this Class is just a way to have an access to all the assets use in the game.
Property
A property is a material that make the rules to the noun.
Renderer
Class to draw or clean the image according to its width, height and position in the screen.
Rules
Class use to manage the rules define in the game, this will manage the game Over and the conditions if the user lost, this will manage how the element in a board can be push, or to manage the priority of the properties.
Run
Class use to generate the levels and run the application and manage the way the player want it to run : it can be run by an entire folder, run just a file or run a file by default.
Text
A Text is an Element of the game that can be materialize, the texts will bring the rules and make the property do specifics things with the nouns.
